Direct Known Subclasses:
Alien, Turret
public class Enemy extends de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.entities.Creature implements de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable
Base class for all enemy creatures in the game. Provides update capability and a placeholder method for line-of-sight checks.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String spritesheetName)
      Creates a new Enemy using the specified spritesheet name.
      Parameters:
      spritesheetName - the spritesheet used to render the enemy

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Called once per update tick. Enemies do not implement internal update behavior by default.
      Specified by:
      update in interface de.gurkenlabs.litiengine.IUpdateable

    • playerInLos

      public boolean playerInLos()
      Determines whether the player is currently within the enemy's line of sight. This base implementation always returns false and should be overridden by subclasses.
      Returns:
      false by default, until implemented by child classes
